representation_information.name: Hierarchical Data Format - Earth Observing System (HDF-EOS), based on HDF Version 4
representation_information.description: HDF-EOS (Hierarchical Data Format (v4) - Earth Observing System) is a self-describing file format for transfer of various types of data between different machines. HDF-EOS is implemented through a software extension to the HDF4 software library.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
